original_text: In the fourteenth year of King Hezekiah, Sennacherib king of Assyria came up against all the fortified cities of Judah and took them.
korean_text: 히스기야 왕 제십사년에 앗수르의 왕 산헤립이 올라와서 유다 모든 견고한 성읍들을 쳐서 점령하매

sentences.original_text: In the fourteenth year of King Hezekiah,
Sennacherib king of Assyria came up against all the fortified cities of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 왕 산헤립이 유다의 모든 견고한 성읍을 치러 올라와서
